title: [Sleeping Drake Harbor, Garden]
description: Winding through the garden, a stone path flanked by playful sprays of moss invites a leisurely stroll.  Ornamental grasses sway gently in the breeze, their delicate blades dancing like whispers.  Beneath the shade of a wide-canopied lemon tree, an old wrought iron bench beckons, its intricate design a testament to time.  The vibrant yellow lemons hanging above create a striking contrast against the lush greenery, offering a refreshing splash of color.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, southeast, northwest
